sqlMap.sql: SELECT area FROM area t WHERE 1=1 <#if areaID?exists && areaID!="" > AND areaID like "%":areaID"%" </#if>
SELECT id , areaID , area FROM area t WHERE father =:father LIMIT :startRow,:endRow
SELECT t.areaID AS father, t.areaType, t.area AS parentName, t2.areaID, t2.area FROM area t, area t2 WHERE t.areaID = t2.father AND t.father IS NULL
select t.id,t.areaID,t.area,t.father,t.areaType from area t
select t.id,t.areaID,t.area,t.father,t.areaType from area t where t.father is null
select t.id,t.areaID,t.area,t.father,t.lng,t.lat,t.areaType from area t where t.father is null AND t.areaID in ('110000','120000','310000','500000')

select t.id,t.areaID, CASE t.areaID WHEN '150000' THEN '内蒙古' WHEN '450000' THEN '广西' WHEN '540000' THEN '西藏' WHEN '640000' THEN '宁夏' WHEN '650000' THEN '新疆' ELSE '' END AS area,t.father,t.lng,t.lat,t.areaType from area t where t.father is null AND t.areaID in ('150000','450000','540000','640000','650000')

select t.id,t.areaID,t.area,t.father,t.lng,t.lat,t.areaType from area t where t.father is null AND t.areaID not in ('110000','120000','310000','500000','150000','450000','540000','640000','650000','810000','820000')
select t.id,t.areaID,t.area,t.father,t.areaType from area t where t.father = :father
select t.id,t.areaID,t.area,t.father,t.lat,t.lng,t.areaType from area t where t.areaID = :areaID

SELECT t.id,t.areaID,t.area,t.father,t.lng,t.lat ,t.areaType, CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM area a WHERE a.father=t.areaID)>0 THEN "true" ELSE "false" END isParent FROM area t WHERE t.father IS NULL ORDER BY t.areaID asc

SELECT t.id,t.areaID,t.area,t.father,t.lng,t.lat ,t.areaType, CASE WHEN t.father IS NULL THEN "0" else t.father end father, CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM area a WHERE a.father=t.areaID)>0 THEN "true" ELSE "false" END isParent FROM area t WHERE t.father IS NULL and areaType=:areaType ORDER BY t.areaID asc
SELECT t.id,t.areaID,t.area,t.father,t.lng,t.lat FROM `area` t ,`area` b WHERE t.`father`=b.`areaID` AND b.`father` IS NULL ORDER BY t.areaID asc

SELECT t.id,t.areaID,t.area,t.father,t.lng,t.lat , b.`area` AS parentName, b.`father` AS pParentId, c.`area` AS pParentName FROM `area` t, `area` b, `area` c WHERE t.`father` = b.`areaID` AND b.`father` IS NOT NULL AND b.`father` = c.`areaID`

SELECT a.areaID AS pParentId, a.area AS pParentName, b.areaID AS father, b.area AS parentName, c.areaID AS areaID, c.area AS area FROM area a LEFT JOIN area b ON a.areaID = b.father LEFT JOIN area c ON b.areaID = c.father WHERE a.father IS NULL <#if provinceId?exists && provinceId!=""> AND a.areaID = :provinceId </#if> <#if cityId?exists && cityId!=""> AND b.areaID = :cityId </#if> <#if countyId?exists && countyId!=""> AND c.areaID = :countyId </#if> LIMIT 1

SELECT t.id, t.areaID, t.area, CASE WHEN t.father IS NULL THEN "0" else t.father end father, CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM area a WHERE a.father=t.areaID)>0 THEN "true" ELSE "false" END isParent, t.areaType FROM area t WHERE t.father = :father ORDER BY t.areaID asc
select t.id,t.areaID,t.area,t.father,t.areaType,t.lng,t.lat from area t where t.area = :area LIMIT 1
update area set lng=:lng, lat=:lat where areaID=:areaID
SELECT t.areaID,t.area,t.father,t.areaType FROM area t
INSERT INTO area ( areaID,area,father,areaType ) VALUES ( :areaID,:area,:father,:areaType )

update area set <#if area?exists && area!=""> area = :area </#if> <#if lat?exists && lat!=""> lat = :lat, </#if> <#if lng?exists && lng!=""> lng = :lng </#if> where <#if areaID?exists && areaID!=""> areaID = :areaID </#if>
delete from area where areaID = :areaID
select t.id,t.areaID,t.lng,t.lat,t.areaType from area t where t.areaID = :cityId
